Package index

All functions

findCisSNPs()
Find cis SNPs around a set of Variable Methylated Regions (VMRs)
findVMRs()
Identify Variable Methylated Regions in microarrays
lmGE()
Fit linear G, E, G+E and GxE models and select the winning model
map_revmap_names()
Map revmap column to probe names after reducing a GenomicRanges object
medCorVMR()
Compute the median probe methylation pearson correlation for each Variable Methylated Region (VMR).
nullDistGE()
Simulate a delta R squared null distribution of G and E effects on DNAme variability
selectVariables()
Selection of environment and genotype variables for Variable Methylated Regions (VMRs)
summarizeVMRs()
Summarize the methylation states of Variable Methylated Regions (VMRs)
test_array_manifest
Array manifest example data set
test_covariates
Concomitant variable example data set
test_environmental_matrix
Environmental exposures example data set
test_genotype_information
Genotype metadata example data set
